properties.description: The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The name of the trail to be created, which must be unique for an account.

properties.name: event_rw
properties.description: (Optional) Indicates whether the event is a read or a write event. Valid values: Read, Write, and All. Default value: Write.

properties.name: oss_bucket_name
properties.description: (Required) The OSS bucket to which the trail delivers logs. Ensure that this is an existing OSS bucket.

properties.name: role_name
properties.description: (Required) The RAM role in ActionTrail permitted by the user.

properties.name: oss_key_prefix
properties.description: (Optional) The prefix of the specified OSS bucket name. This parameter can be left empty.

properties.name: sls_project_arn
properties.description: (Optional) The unique ARN of the Log Service project.

properties.name: sls_write_role_arn
properties.description: (Optional) The unique ARN of the Log Service role.
NOTE: sls_project_arn and sls_write_role_arn should be set or not set at the same time when actiontrail delivers logs.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: instance_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) ID of the ALIKAFKA Instance that owns the groups.

properties.name: consumer_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) ID of the consumer group. The length cannot exceed 64 characters..
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) Name of your Kafka instance. The length should between 3 and 64 characters.

properties.name: topic_quota
properties.description: (Required) The max num of topic can be create of the instance. When modify this value, it only adjust to a greater value.

properties.name: disk_type
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The disk type of the instance. 0: efficient cloud disk , 1: SSD.

properties.name: disk_size
properties.description: (Required) The disk size of the instance. When modify this value, it only adjust to a greater value.

properties.name: deploy_type
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The deploy type of the instance. Currently only support two deploy type, 4: eip/vpc instance, 5: vpc instance.

properties.name: io_max
properties.description: (Required) The max value of io of the instance. When modify this value, it only adjust to a greater value.

properties.name: eip_max
properties.description: (Optional) The max bandwidth of the instance. When modify this value, it only adjust to a greater value.

properties.name: vswitch_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of attaching vswitch to instance.
NOTE: Arguments io_max, disk_size, topic_quota, eip_max should follow the following constraints.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: instance_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) InstanceId of your Kafka resource, the topic will create in this instance.

properties.name: topic
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Name of the topic. Two topics on a single instance cannot have the same name. The length cannot exceed 64 characters.

properties.name: local_topic
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Whether the topic is localTopic or not.

properties.name: compact_topic
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Whether the topic is compactTopic or not. Compact topic must be a localTopic.

properties.name: partition_num
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The number of partitions of the topic. The number should between 1 and 48.

properties.name: remark
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) This attribute is a concise description of topic. The length cannot exceed 64.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the api gateway api. Defaults to null.

properties.name: group_id

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Required) The description of the api. Defaults to null.

properties.name: auth_type
properties.description: (Required) The authorization Type including APP and ANONYMOUS. Defaults to null.

properties.name: request_config
properties.description: (Required, Type: list) Request_config defines how users can send requests to your API.

properties.name: service_type
properties.description: (Required) The type of backend service. Type including HTTP,VPC and MOCK. Defaults to null.

properties.name: http_service_config
properties.description: (Optional, Type: list) http_service_config defines the config when service_type selected 'HTTP'.

properties.name: http_vpc_service_config
properties.description: (Optional, Type: list) http_vpc_service_config defines the config when service_type selected 'HTTP-VPC'.

properties.name: fc_service_config
properties.description: (Optional, Type: list) fc_service_config defines the config when service_type selected 'FunctionCompute'.

properties.name: mock_service_config
properties.description: (Optional, Type: list) http_service_config defines the config when service_type selected 'MOCK'.

properties.name: request_parameters
properties.description: (Required, Type: list) request_parameters defines the request parameters of the api.

properties.name: constant_parameters
properties.description: (Required, Type: list) constant_parameters defines the constant parameters of the api.

properties.name: system_parameters
properties.description: (Required, Type: list) system_parameters defines the system parameters of the api.

properties.name: stage_names
properties.description: (Optional, Type: list) Stages that the api need to be deployed. Valid value: RELEASE | PRE | TEST.

properties.name: block-request_config

The request_config mapping supports the following:

properties.name: protocol

properties.name: method

properties.name: path

properties.name: mode

properties.name: body_format
properties.description: (Optional) The body format of the api, which support the values of 'STREAM' and 'FORM'

properties.name: block-http_service_config

properties.name: address

properties.name: path

properties.name: method

properties.name: timeout

properties.name: block-http_vpc_service_config

properties.name: path

properties.name: method
properties.description: (Required) The http method of backend service.

properties.name: timeout
properties.description: (Required) Backend service time-out time; unit: millisecond.

properties.name: block-fc_vpc_service_config

The fc_service_config mapping supports the following:

properties.name: function_name

properties.name: service_name

properties.name: arn_role
properties.description: (Optional) RAM role arn attached to the Function Compute service. This governs both who / what can invoke your Function, as well as what resources our Function has access to. See User Permissions for more details.

properties.name: timeout
properties.description: (Required) Backend service time-out time; unit: millisecond.

properties.name: block-mock_service_config
properties.description: » Block mock_service_config
The mock_service_config mapping supports the following:

properties.name: result
properties.description: (Required) The result of the mock service.

properties.name: block-request_parameters
properties.description: » Block request_parameters
The request_parameters mapping supports the following:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) Request's parameter name.

properties.name: type
properties.description: (Required) Parameter type which supports values of 'STRING','INT','BOOLEAN','LONG',"FLOAT" and "DOUBLE"

properties.name: required
properties.description: (Required) Parameter required or not; values: REQUIRED and OPTIONAL.

properties.name: in
properties.description: (Required) Request's parameter location; values: BODY, HEAD, QUERY, and PATH.

properties.name: in_service
properties.description: (Required) Backend service's parameter location; values: BODY, HEAD, QUERY, and PATH.

properties.name: name_service
properties.description: (Required) Backend service's parameter name.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The description of parameter.

properties.name: default_value
properties.description: (Optional) The default value of the parameter.

properties.name: block-constant_parameters
properties.description: » Block constant_parameters
The constant_parameters mapping supports the following:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) Constant parameter name.

properties.name: in
properties.description: (Required) Constant parameter location; values: 'HEAD' and 'QUERY'.

properties.name: value
properties.description: (Required) Constant parameter value.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The description of Constant parameter.

properties.name: block-system_parameters
properties.description: » Block system_parameters
The system_parameters mapping supports the following:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) System parameter name which supports values including in system parameter list

properties.name: in
properties.description: (Required) System parameter location; values: 'HEAD' and 'QUERY'.

properties.name: name_service
properties.description: (Required) Backend service's parameter name.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the app. Defaults to null.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The description of the app. Defaults to null.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.55.3+) A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: api_id
properties.description: (Required，ForceNew) The api_id that app apply to access.

properties.name: group_id
properties.description: (Required，ForceNew) The group that the api belongs to.

properties.name: app_id
properties.description: (Required，ForceNew) The app that apply to the authorization.

properties.name: stage_name
properties.description: (Required，ForceNew) Stage that the app apply to access.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the api gateway group. Defaults to null.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Required) The description of the api gateway group. Defaults to null.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required，ForceNew) The name of the vpc authorization.

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Required，ForceNew) The vpc id of the vpc authorization.

properties.name: instance_id
properties.description: (Required，ForceNew) ID of the instance in VPC (ECS/Server Load Balance).

properties.name: port
properties.description: (Required，ForceNew) ID of the port corresponding to the instance.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, ForcesNew) Name of the Certificate. This name without suffix can have a string of 1 to 63 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or "-", and must not begin or end with "-", and "-" must not in the 3th and 4th character positions at the same time. Suffix .sh and .tel are not supported.

properties.name: cert
properties.description: (Required, ForcesNew) Cert of the Certificate in which the Certificate will add.

properties.name: key
properties.description: (Required, ForcesNew) Key of the Certificate in which the Certificate will add.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: domain_name
properties.description: (Required) Name of the accelerated domain. This name without suffix can have a string of 1 to 63 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or "-", and must not begin or end with "-", and "-" must not in the 3th and 4th character positions at the same time. Suffix .sh and .tel are not supported.

properties.name: cdn_type
properties.description: (Required) Cdn type of the accelerated domain. Valid values are web, download, video, liveStream.

properties.name: source_type
properties.description: (Optional) Source type of the accelerated domain. Valid values are ipaddr, domain, oss. You must set this parameter when cdn_type value is not liveStream.

properties.name: source_port
properties.description: (Optional) Source port of the accelerated domain. Valid values are 80 and 443. Default value is 80. You must use 80 when the source_type is oss.

properties.name: sources
properties.description: (Optional, Type: list) Sources of the accelerated domain. It's a list of domain names or IP address and consists of at most 20 items. You must set this parameter when cdn_type value is not liveStream.

properties.name: scope
properties.description: (Optional) Scope of the accelerated domain. Valid values are domestic, overseas, global. Default value is domestic. This parameter's setting is valid Only for the international users and domestic L3 and above users .

properties.name: domain-config
properties.description: » Domain config
The config supports the following:

properties.name: optimize_enable
properties.description: (Optional) Page Optimize config of the accelerated domain. Valid values are on and off. Default value is off. It can effectively remove the page redundant content, reduce the file size and improve the speed of distribution when this parameter value is on.

properties.name: page_compress_enable
properties.description: (Optional) Page Compress config of the accelerated domain. Valid values are on and off. Default value is off.

properties.name: range_enable
properties.description: (Optional) Range Source config of the accelerated domain. Valid values are on and off. Default value is off.

properties.name: video_seek_enable
properties.description: (Optional) Video Seek config of the accelerated domain. Valid values are on and off. Default value is off.

properties.name: block-parameter_filter_config
properties.description: » Block parameter_filter_config

parameter_filter_config - (Optional, Type: set) Parameter filter config of the accelerated domain. It's a set and consists of at most one item. * enable - (Optional) This parameter indicates whether or not the parameter_filter_config is enable. Valid values are on and off. Default value is off.
* hash_key_args - (Optional, Type: list) Reserved parameters of parameter_filter_config. It's a list of string and consists of at most 10 items.

properties.name: block-page_404_config
properties.description: » Block page_404_config

page_404_config - (Optional, Type: set) Error Page config of the accelerated domain. It's a set and consists of at most one item. * page_type - (Optional) Page type of the error page. Valid values are default, charity, other. Default value is default. * custom_page_url - (Optional) Custom page url of the error page. It must be the full path under the accelerated domain name. It's value must be http://promotion.alicdn.com/help/oss/error.html when page_type value is charity and It can not be set when page_type value is default.

properties.name: block-refer_config
properties.description: » Block refer_config

refer_config - (Optional, Type: set) Refer anti-theft chain config of the accelerated domain. It's a set and consists of at most 1 item. * refer_type - (Optional) Refer type of the refer config. Valid values are block and allow. Default value is block. * refer_list - (Required, Type: list) A list of domain names of the refer config. * allow_empty - (Optional) This parameter indicates whether or not to allow empty refer access. Valid values are on and off. Default value is on.

properties.name: block-auth_config
properties.description: » Block auth_config

auth_config - (Optional, Type: set) Auth config of the accelerated domain. It's a set and consist of at most 1 item. * auth_type - (Optional) Auth type of the auth config. Valid values are no_auth, type_a, type_b and type_c. Default value is no_auth. * master_key - (Optional) Master authentication key of the auth config. This parameter can have a string of 6 to 32 characters and must contain only alphanumeric characters. * slave_key - (Optional) Slave authentication key of the auth config. This parameter can have a string of 6 to 32 characters and must contain only alphanumeric characters. * timeout - (Optional, Type: int) Authentication cache time of the auth config. Default value is 1800. It's value is valid only when the auth_type is type_b or type_c.

properties.name: block-certificate_config
properties.description: » Block certificate_config

certificate_config - (Optional, Type: set) Certificate config of the accelerated domain. It's a set and consist of at most 1 item. * server_certificate_status - (Optional) This parameter indicates whether or not enable https. Valid values are on and off. Default value is on. * server_certificate - (Optional) The SSL server certificate string. This is required if server_certificate_status is on * private_key - (Optional) The SSL private key. This is required if server_certificate_status is on

properties.name: block-http_header_config
properties.description: » Block http_header_config

http_header_config - (Optional, Type: set) Http header config of the accelerated domain. It's a set and consist of at most 8 items. The header_key for each item can not be repeated. * header_key - (Required) Header key of the http header. Valid values are Content-Type, Cache-Control, Content-Disposition, Content-Language，Expires, Access-Control-Allow-Origin, Access-Control-Allow-Methods and Access-Control-Max-Age. * header_value - (Required) Header value of the http header.

properties.name: block-cache_config
properties.description: » Block cache_config

cache_config - (Optional, Type: set) Cache config of the accelerated domain. It's a set and each item's cache_content can not be repeated. * cache_type - (Required) Cache type of the cache config. Valid values are suffix and path. * cache_content - (Required) Cache content of the cache config. It's value is a path string when the cache_type is path. When the cache_type is suffix, it's value is a string which contains multiple file suffixes separated by commas. * ttl - (Required, Type: int) Cache time of the cache config. * weight - (Optional, Type: int) Weight of the cache config. This parameter's value is between 1 and 99. Default value is 1. The higher the value, the higher the priority.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: domain_name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Name of the accelerated domain. This name without suffix can have a string of 1 to 63 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or "-", and must not begin or end with "-", and "-" must not in the 3th and 4th character positions at the same time. Suffix .sh and .tel are not supported.

properties.name: function_name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The name of the domain config.

properties.name: function_args
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew, Type: list) The args of the domain config.

properties.name: block-function_args
properties.description: » Block function_args
The function_args block supports the following:

properties.name: arg_name
properties.description: (Required) The name of arg.

properties.name: arg_value
properties.description: (Required) The value of arg.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: domain_name
properties.description: (Required) Name of the accelerated domain. This name without suffix can have a string of 1 to 63 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or "-", and must not begin or end with "-", and "-" must not in the 3th and 4th character positions at the same time. Suffix .sh and .tel are not supported.

properties.name: cdn_type
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Cdn type of the accelerated domain. Valid values are web, download, video.

properties.name: scope
properties.description: (Optional) Scope of the accelerated domain. Valid values are domestic, overseas, global. Default value is domestic. This parameter's setting is valid Only for the international users and domestic L3 and above users .

properties.name: sources
properties.description: (Optional, Type: list) The source address list of the accelerated domain. Defaults to null. See Block Sources.

properties.name: certificate_config
properties.description: (Optional, Type: list, Available in 1.52.0+)  Certificate config of the accelerated domain. It's a list and consist of at most 1 item.

properties.name: block-sources
properties.description: » Block sources
The sources block supports the following:

properties.name: content
properties.description: (Required) The adress of source. Valid values can be ip or doaminName. Each item's content can not be repeated.

properties.name: type
properties.description: (Required) The type of the source. Valid values are ipaddr, domain and oss.

properties.name: port
properties.description: (Optional, Type: int) The port of source. Valid values are 443 and 80. Default value is 80.

properties.name: priority
properties.description: (Optional, Type: int) Priority of the source. Valid values are 0 and 100. Default value is 20.

properties.name: weight
properties.description: (Optional, Type: int) Weight of the source. Valid values are from 0 to 100. Default value is 10, but if type is ipaddr, the value can only be 10.

properties.name: block-certificate_config
properties.description: » Block certificate_config
The certificate_config block supports the following:

properties.name: server_certificate_status
properties.description: (Optional) This parameter indicates whether or not enable https. Valid values are on and off. Default value is on.

properties.name: server_certificate
properties.description: (Optional) The SSL server certificate string. This is required if server_certificate_status is on

properties.name: private_key
properties.description: (Optional) The SSL private key. This is required if server_certificate_status is on

properties.name: force_set
properties.description: (Optional) Set 1 to ignore the repeated verification for certificate name, and cover the information of the origin certificate (with the same name). Set 0 to work the verification.

properties.name: cert_name
properties.description: (Optional) The SSL certificate name.

properties.name: cert_type
properties.description: (Optional) The SSL certificate type, can be "upload", "cas" and "free".

properties.name: tags
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.55.2+) A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: instance_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the CEN.

properties.name: region_ids
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) List of the two regions to interconnect. Must be two different regions.

properties.name: bandwidth_limit
properties.description: (Required) The bandwidth configured for the interconnected regions communication.
->NOTE: The "alicloud_cen_bandwidthlimit" resource depends on the related "alicloud_cen_bandwidth_package_attachment" resource and "alicloud_cen_instance_attachment" resource.

properties.name: timeouts
properties.description: » Timeouts
NOTE: Available in 1.48.0+.
The timeouts block allows you to specify timeouts for certain actions:

properties.name: update
properties.description: (Defaults to 10 mins) Used when activating the cen bandwidth limit when necessary during update

properties.name: delete
properties.description: (Defaults to 10 mins) Used when terminating the cen bandwidth limit.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: bandwidth
properties.description: (Required) The bandwidth in Mbps of the bandwidth package. Cannot be less than 2Mbps.

properties.name: geographic_region_ids
properties.description: (Required) List of the two areas to connect. Valid value: China | North-America | Asia-Pacific | Europe | Middle-East.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the bandwidth package. Defaults to null.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The description of the bandwidth package. Default to null.

properties.name: charge_type
properties.description: (Optional) The billing method. Valid value: PostPaid | PrePaid. Default to PostPaid. If set to PrePaid, the bandwidth package can't be deleted before expired time.

properties.name: period
properties.description: (Optional) The purchase period in month. Valid value: 1, 2, 3, 6, 12. Default to 1.
->NOTE: PrePaid mode will deduct fees from the account directly and the bandwidth package can't be deleted before expired time.
->NOTE: The PostPaid mode is only for test. Please open a ticket if you need.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: instance_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the CEN.

properties.name: bandwidth_package_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the bandwidth package.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the CEN instance. Defaults to null.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The description of the CEN instance. Defaults to null.

properties.name: timeouts
properties.description: » Timeouts
NOTE: Available in 1.48.0+.
The timeouts block allows you to specify timeouts for certain actions:

properties.name: create
properties.description: (Defaults to 5 mins) Used when creating the cen instance (until it reaches the initial Active status).

properties.name: delete
properties.description: (Defaults to 3 mins) Used when terminating the cen instance.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: instance_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the CEN.

properties.name: child_instance_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the child instance to attach.

properties.name: child_instance_region_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The region ID of the child instance to attach.

properties.name: child_instance_owner_id
properties.description: (Optional, Available in 1.42.0+) The uid of the child instance. Only used when attach a child instance of other account.
->NOTE: Ensure that the child instance is not used in Express Connect.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: cen_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the CEN.

properties.name: child_instance_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the child instance to grant.

properties.name: cen_owner_id
properties.description: (Required) The owner UID of the CEN which the child instance granted to.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: instance_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the CEN.

properties.name: route_table_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The route table of the attached VBR or VPC.

properties.name: cidr_block
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The destination CIDR block of the route entry to publish.
->NOTE: The "alicloud_cen_instance_route_entries" resource depends on the related "alicloud_cen_instance_attachment" resource.
->NOTE: The "alicloud_cen_instance_attachment" resource should depend on the related "alicloud_vswitch" resource.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the CCN instance. The name can contain 2 to 128 characters including a-z, A-Z, 0-9, periods, underlines, and hyphens. The name must start with an English letter, but cannot start with http:// or https://.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The description of the CCN instance. The description can contain 2 to 256 characters. The description must start with English letters, but cannot start with http:// or https://.

properties.name: cidr_block
properties.description: (Optional) The CidrBlock of the CCN instance. Defaults to null.

properties.name: is_default
properties.description: (Required) Created by default. If the client does not have ccn in the binding, it will create a ccn for the user to replace.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The alarm rule name.

properties.name: project
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Monitor project name, such as "acs_ecs_dashboard" and "acs_rds_dashboard". For more information, see Metrics Reference.

properties.name: metric
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Name of the monitoring metrics corresponding to a project, such as "CPUUtilization" and "networkin_rate". For more information, see Metrics Reference.

properties.name: dimensions
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Map of the resources associated with the alarm rule, such as "instanceId", "device" and "port". Each key's value is a string and it uses comma to split multiple items. For more information, see Metrics Reference.

properties.name: period
properties.description: Index query cycle, which must be consistent with that defined for metrics. Default to 300, in seconds.

properties.name: statistics
properties.description: Statistical method. It must be consistent with that defined for metrics. Valid values: ["Average", "Minimum", "Maximum"]. Default to "Average".

properties.name: operator
properties.description: Alarm comparison operator. Valid values: ["<=", "<", ">", ">=", "==", "!="]. Default to "==".

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: (Required) Alarm threshold value, which must be a numeric value currently.

properties.name: triggered_count
properties.description: Number of consecutive times it has been detected that the values exceed the threshold. Default to 3.

properties.name: contact_groups
properties.description: (Required) List contact groups of the alarm rule, which must have been created on the console.

properties.name: start_time
properties.description: Start time of the alarm effective period. Default to 0 and it indicates the time 00:00. Valid value range: [0, 24].

properties.name: end_time
properties.description: End time of the alarm effective period. Default value 24 and it indicates the time 24:00. Valid value range: [0, 24].

properties.name: silence_time
properties.description: Notification silence period in the alarm state, in seconds. Valid value range: [300, 86400]. Default to 86400

properties.name: notify_type
properties.description: Notification type. Valid value [0, 1]. The value 0 indicates TradeManager+email, and the value 1 indicates that TradeManager+email+SMS

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable alarm rule. Default to true.

properties.name: webhook
properties.description: - (Optional, Available in 1.46.0+) The webhook that should be called when the alarm is triggered. Currently, only http protocol is supported. Default is empty string.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: cluster_name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The swarm cluster's name.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The application name. It should be 1-64 characters long, and can contain numbers, English letters and hyphens, but cannot start with hyphens.

properties.name: description
properties.description: The description of application.

properties.name: version
properties.description: The application deploying version. Each updating, it must be different with current. Default to "1.0"

properties.name: template
properties.description: (Required) The application deployment template and it must be Docker Compose format.

properties.name: environment
properties.description: A key/value map used to replace the variable parameter in the Compose template.

properties.name: latest_image
properties.description: Whether to use latest docker image while each updating application. Default to false.

properties.name: blue_green
properties.description: Wherther to use "Blue Green" method when release a new version. Default to false.

properties.name: blue_green_confirm
properties.description: Whether to confirm a "Blue Green" application. Default to false. It will be ignored when blue_green is false.
NOTE: Each update of template, environment, latest_image and blue_green, it requires a new version. Otherwise, the update will be ignored.
NOTE: If you want to rollback a "Blue Green" application, just set blue_green as false.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The kubernetes cluster's name. It is the only in one Alicloud account.

properties.name: name_prefix
properties.description: (Optional) The kubernetes cluster name's prefix. It is conflict with name. If it is specified, terraform will using it to build the only cluster name. Default to "Terraform-Creation".

properties.name: force_update
properties.description: (Optional, Available in 1.50.0+) Whether to force the update of kubernetes cluster arguments. Default to false.

properties.name: availability_zone
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The Zone where new kubernetes cluster will be located. If it is not be specified, the vswitch_ids should be set, its value will be vswitch's zone.

properties.name: vswitch_id
properties.description: (Deprecated from version 1.16.0)(Force new resource) The vswitch where new kubernetes cluster will be located. If it is not specified, a new VPC and VSwicth will be built. It must be in the zone which availability_zone specified.

properties.name: vswitch_ids
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The vswitch where new kubernetes cluster will be located. For SingleAZ Cluster, if it is not specified, a new VPC and VSwicth will be built. It must be in the zone which availability_zone specified. For MultiAZ Cluster, you must create three vswitches firstly, specify them here.

properties.name: new_nat_gateway
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Whether to create a new nat gateway while creating kubernetes cluster. Default to true.

properties.name: master_instance_type
properties.description: (Deprecated from version 1.16.0)(Required, Force new resource) The instance type of master node.

properties.name: master_instance_types
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The instance type of master node. Specify one type for single AZ Cluster, three types for MultiAZ Cluster. You can get the available kubetnetes master node instance types by datasource instance_types

properties.name: worker_instance_type
properties.description: (Deprecated from version 1.16.0)(Required, Force new resource) The instance type of worker node.

properties.name: worker_instance_types
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The instance type of worker node. Specify one type for single AZ Cluster, three types for MultiAZ Cluster. You can get the available kubetnetes master node instance types by datasource instance_types

properties.name: worker_number
properties.description: (Required) The worker node number of the kubernetes cluster. Default to 3. It is limited up to 50 and if you want to enlarge it, please apply white list or contact with us.

properties.name: password
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew, Sensitive) The password of ssh login cluster node. You have to specify one of password key_name kms_encrypted_password fields.

properties.name: key_name
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The keypair of ssh login cluster node, you have to create it first.

properties.name: kms_encrypted_password
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew, Available in 1.57.1+) An KMS encrypts password used to a cs kubernetes. It is conflicted with password and key_name.

properties.name: kms_encryption_context
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew, MapString, Available in 1.57.1+) An KMS encryption context used to decrypt kms_encrypted_password before creating or updating a cs kubernetes with kms_encrypted_password. See Encryption Context. It is valid when kms_encrypted_password is set.

properties.name: user_ca
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The path of customized CA cert, you can use this CA to sign client certs to connect your cluster.

properties.name: cluster_network_type
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The network that cluster uses, use flannel or terway.

properties.name: pod_cidr
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The CIDR block for the pod network. It will be allocated automatically when vswitch_ids is not specified. It cannot be duplicated with the VPC CIDR and CIDR used by Kubernetes cluster in VPC, cannot be modified after creation. Maximum number of hosts allowed in the cluster: 256. Refer to Plan Kubernetes CIDR blocks under VPC.

properties.name: service_cidr
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The CIDR block for the service network. It will be allocated automatically when vswitch_id is not specified. It cannot be duplicated with the VPC CIDR and CIDR used by Kubernetes cluster in VPC, cannot be modified after creation.

properties.name: master_instance_charge_type
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Master payment type. PrePaid or PostPaid, defaults to PostPaid.

properties.name: master_period_unit
properties.description: (Optional) Master payment period unit. Month or Week, defaults to Month.

properties.name: master_period
properties.description: (Optional) Master payment period. When period unit is Month, it can be one of { “1”, “2”, “3”, “4”, “5”, “6”, “7”, “8”, “9”, “12”, “24”, “36”,”48”,”60”}. When period unit is Week, it can be one of {“1”, “2”, “3”, “4”}.

properties.name: master_auto_renew
properties.description: (Optional) Enable master payment auto-renew, defaults to false.

properties.name: master_auto_renew_period
properties.description: (Optional) Master payment auto-renew period. When period unit is Month, it can be one of {“1”, “2”, “3”, “6”, “12”}. When period unit is Week, it can be one of {“1”, “2”, “3”}.

properties.name: worker_instance_charge_type
properties.description: (Optional, Force new resource) Worker payment type. PrePaid or PostPaid, defaults to PostPaid.

properties.name: worker_period_unit
properties.description: (Optional) Worker payment period unit. Month or Week, defaults to Month.

properties.name: worker_period
properties.description: (Optional) Worker payment period. When period unit is Month, it can be one of { “1”, “2”, “3”, “4”, “5”, “6”, “7”, “8”, “9”, “12”, “24”, “36”,”48”,”60”}. When period unit is Week, it can be one of {“1”, “2”, “3”, “4”}.

properties.name: worker_auto_renew
properties.description: (Optional) Enable worker payment auto-renew, defaults to false.

properties.name: worker_auto_renew_period
properties.description: (Optional) Worker payment auto-renew period. When period unit is Month, it can be one of {“1”, “2”, “3”, “6”, “12”}. When period unit is Week, it can be one of {“1”, “2”, “3”}.

properties.name: node_cidr_mask
properties.description: (Optional, Force new resource) The network mask used on pods for each node, ranging from 24 to 28. Larger this number is, less pods can be allocated on each node. Default value is 24, means you can allocate 256 pods on each node.

properties.name: list description
type
properties.description: Type of collecting logs, only SLS are supported currently.

properties.name: project
properties.description: Log Service project name, cluster logs will output to this project.

properties.name: enable_ssh
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Whether to allow to SSH login kubernetes. Default to false.

properties.name: slb_internet_enabled
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Whether to create internet load balancer for API Server. Default to true.

properties.name: master_disk_category
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The system disk category of master node. Its valid value are cloud_ssd and cloud_efficiency. Default to cloud_efficiency.

properties.name: master_disk_size
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The system disk size of master node. Its valid value range [20~32768] in GB. Default to 20.

properties.name: worker_disk_category
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The system disk category of worker node. Its valid value are cloud_ssd and cloud_efficiency. Default to cloud_efficiency.

properties.name: worker_disk_size
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The system disk size of worker node. Its valid value range [20~32768] in GB. Default to 20.

properties.name: worker_data_disk_size
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The data disk size of worker node. Its valid value range [20~32768] in GB. When worker_data_disk_category is presented, it defaults to 40.

properties.name: worker_data_disk_category
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The data disk category of worker node. Its valid value are cloud_ssd and cloud_efficiency, if not set, data disk will not be created.

properties.name: install_cloud_monitor
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Whether to install cloud monitor for the kubernetes' node.

properties.name: is_outdated
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to use outdated instance type. Default to false.

properties.name: kube_config
properties.description: (Optional) The path of kube config, like ~/.kube/config.

properties.name: client_cert
properties.description: (Optional) The path of client certificate, like ~/.kube/client-cert.pem.

properties.name: client_key
properties.description: (Optional) The path of client key, like ~/.kube/client-key.pem.

properties.name: cluster_ca_cert
properties.description: (Optional) The path of cluster ca certificate, like ~/.kube/cluster-ca-cert.pem

The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: The container cluster's name. It is the only in one Alicloud account.

properties.name: name_prefix
properties.description: The container cluster name's prefix. It is conflict with name. If it is specified, terraform will using it to build the only cluster name. Default to 'Terraform-Creation'.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Field 'size' has been deprecated from provider version 1.9.1. New field 'node_number' replaces it.

properties.name: node_number
properties.description: The ECS node number of the container cluster. Its value choices are 1~50, and default to 1.

properties.name: list description

properties.description: System reserved private network address: 172.16/17/18/31.0.0/16. Maximum number of hosts allowed in the cluster: 256.

properties.name: image_id
properties.description: (ForceNew) The image ID of ECS instance node used. Default to System automate allocated.

properties.name: instance_type
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The type of ECS instance node.

properties.name: is_outdated
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to use outdated instance type. Default to false.

properties.name: password
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew, Sensitive) The password of ECS instance node.

properties.name: disk_category
properties.description: (ForceNew) The data disk category of ECS instance node. Its valid value are cloud, cloud_ssd, cloud_essd, ephemeral_essd and cloud_efficiency. Default to cloud_efficiency.

properties.name: disk_size
properties.description: (ForceNew) The data disk size of ECS instance node. Its valid value is 20~32768 GB. Default to 20.

properties.name: vswitch_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The password of ECS instance node. If it is not specified, the container cluster's network mode will be Classic.

properties.name: release_eip
properties.description: Whether to release EIP after creating swarm cluster successfully. Default to false.

properties.name: need_slb
properties.description: - (ForceNew) Whether to create the default simple routing Server Load Balancer instance for the cluster. The default value is true.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Name of Container Registry namespace.

properties.name: auto_create
properties.description: (Required) Boolean, when it set to true, repositories are automatically created when pushing new images. If it set to false, you create repository for images before pushing.

properties.name: default_visibility
properties.description: (Required) PUBLIC or PRIVATE, default repository visibility in this namespace.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: namespace
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Name of container registry namespace where repository is located.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Name of container registry repository.

properties.name: summary
properties.description: (Required) The repository general information. It can contain 1 to 80 characters.

properties.name: repo_type
properties.description: (Required) PUBLIC or PRIVATE, repo's visibility.

properties.name: detail
properties.description: (Optional) The repository specific information. MarkDown format is supported, and the length limit is 2000.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The name of the datahub project. Its length is limited to 3-32 and only characters such as letters, digits and '_' are allowed. It is case-insensitive.

properties.name: comment
properties.description: (Optional) Comment of the datahub project. It cannot be longer than 255 characters.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: project_name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The name of the datahub project that the subscription belongs to. Its length is limited to 3-32 and only characters such as letters, digits and '_' are allowed. It is case-insensitive.

properties.name: topic_name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The name of the datahub topic that the subscription belongs to. Its length is limited to 1-128 and only characters such as letters, digits and '_' are allowed. It is case-insensitive.

properties.name: comment
properties.description: (Optional) Comment of the datahub subscription. It cannot be longer than 255 characters.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The name of the datahub topic. Its length is limited to 1-128 and only characters such as letters, digits and '_' are allowed. It is case-insensitive.

properties.name: project_name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The name of the datahub project that this topic belongs to. It is case-insensitive.

properties.name: shard_count
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The number of shards this topic contains. The permitted range of values is [1, 10]. The default value is 1.

properties.name: life_cycle
properties.description: (Optional) How many days this topic lives. The permitted range of values is [1, 7]. The default value is 3.

properties.name: record_type
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The type of this topic. Its value must be one of {BLOB, TUPLE}. For BLOB topic, data will be organized as binary and encoded by BASE64. For TUPLE topic, data has fixed schema. The default value is "TUPLE" with a schema {STRING}.

properties.name: list description
BIGINT
properties.description: • BIGINT

properties.name: STRING
properties.description: • STRING

properties.name: BOOLEAN
properties.description: • BOOLEAN

properties.name: DOUBLE
properties.description: • DOUBLE

properties.name: TIMESTAMP
properties.description: • TIMESTAMP

properties.name: comment
properties.description: (Optional) Comment of the datahub topic. It cannot be longer than 255 characters.
Notes: Currently life_cycle can not be modified and it will be supported in the next future.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: type
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Type of the instance. Valid values: Enterprise,Professional. Default to Enterprise

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) Name of the instance. This name can have a string of 1 to 63 characters.

properties.name: base_bandwidth
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Base defend bandwidth of the instance. Valid values: 20. The unit is Gbps. Default to 20.

properties.name: bandwidth
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Elastic defend bandwidth of the instance. This value must be larger than the base defend bandwidth. Valid values: 51,91,101,201,301. The unit is Gbps.

properties.name: ip_count
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) IP count of the instance. Valid values: 100.

properties.name: ip_type
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) IP version of the instance. Valid values: IPv4,IPv6.

properties.name: period
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The duration that you will buy Ddosbgp instance (in month). Valid values: [1~9], 12, 24, 36. Default to 12. At present, the provider does not support modify "period".
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) Name of the instance. This name can have a string of 1 to 63 characters.

properties.name: base_bandwidth
properties.description: (Required) Base defend bandwidth of the instance. Valid values: 30, 60, 100, 300, 400, 500, 600. The unit is Gbps. Only support upgrade.

properties.name: bandwidth
properties.description: (Required) Elastic defend bandwidth of the instance. This value must be larger than the base defend bandwidth. Valid values: 30, 60, 100, 300, 400, 500, 600. The unit is Gbps. Only support upgrade.

properties.name: service_bandwidth
properties.description: (Required) Business bandwidth of the instance. At leaset 100. Increased 100 per step, such as 100, 200, 300. The unit is Mbps. Only support upgrade.

properties.name: port_count
properties.description: (Required) Port retransmission rule count of the instance. At least 50. Increase 5 per step, such as 55, 60, 65. Only support upgrade.

properties.name: domain_count
properties.description: (Required) Domain retransmission rule count of the instance. At least 50. Increase 5 per step, such as 55, 60, 65. Only support upgrade.

properties.name: period
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The duration that you will buy Ddoscoo instance (in month). Valid values: [1~9], 12, 24, 36. Default to 1. At present, the provider does not support modify "period".
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Name of the domain. This name without suffix can have a string of 1 to 63 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or "-", and must not begin or end with "-", and "-" must not in the 3th and 4th character positions at the same time. Suffix .sh and .tel are not supported.

properties.name: group_id
properties.description: (Optional) Id of the group in which the domain will add. If not supplied, then use default group.

properties.name: resource_group_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew, Available in 1.59.0+) The Id of resource group which the dns belongs.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) Name of the domain group.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) Name of the domain. This name without suffix can have a string of 1 to 63 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or "-", and must not begin or end with "-", and "-" must not in the 3th and 4th character positions at the same time. Suffix .sh and .tel are not supported.

properties.name: host_record
properties.description: (Required) Host record for the domain record. This host_record can have at most 253 characters, and each part split with "." can have at most 63 characters, and must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, such as "-",".","*","@", and must not begin or end with "-".

properties.name: type
properties.description: (Required) The type of domain record. Valid values are A,NS,MX,TXT,CNAME,SRV,AAAA,CAA, REDIRECT_URL and FORWORD_URL.

properties.name: value
properties.description: (Required) The value of domain record, When the type is MX,NS,CNAME,SRV, the server will treat the value as a fully qualified domain name, so it's no need to add a . at the end.

properties.name: ttl
properties.description: (Optional) The effective time of domain record. Its scope depends on the edition of the cloud resolution. Free is [600, 86400], Basic is [120, 86400], Standard is [60, 86400], Ultimate is [10, 86400], Exclusive is [1, 86400]. Default value is 600.

properties.name: priority
properties.description: (Optional) The priority of domain record. Valid values are [1-10]. When the type is MX, this parameter is required.

properties.name: routing
properties.description: (Optional) The parsing line of domain record. Valid values are default, telecom, unicom, mobile, oversea, edu, drpeng, btvn, .etc. When the type is FORWORD_URL, this parameter must be default. Default value is default. For checking all resolution lines enumeration please visit Alibaba Cloud DNS doc

The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: availability_zone
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The Zone to create the disk in.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) Name of the ECS disk. This name can have a string of 2 to 128 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, such as "-",".","_", and must not begin or end with a hyphen, and must not begin with http:// or https://. Default value is null.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Description of the disk. This description can have a string of 2 to 256 characters, It cannot begin with http:// or https://. Default value is null.

properties.name: category
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Category of the disk. Valid values are cloud, cloud_efficiency, cloud_ssd, cloud_essd. Default is cloud_efficiency.

properties.name: size
properties.description: (Required) The size of the disk in GiBs. When resize the disk, the new size must be greater than the former value, or you would get an error InvalidDiskSize.TooSmall.

properties.name: snapshot_id
properties.description: (Optional) A snapshot to base the disk off of. If the disk size required by snapshot is greater than size, the size will be ignored, conflict with encrypted.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: (Optional) A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

properties.name: encrypted
properties.description: (Optional) If true, the disk will be encrypted, conflict with snapshot_id.

properties.name: delete_auto_snapshot
properties.description: (Optional Available in 1.53.0+) Indicates whether the automatic snapshot is deleted when the disk is released. Default value: false.

properties.name: delete_with_instance
properties.description: (Optional Available in 1.53.0+) Indicates whether the disk is released together with the instance: Default value: false.

properties.name: enable_auto_snapshot
properties.description: (Optional Available in 1.53.0+) Indicates whether to apply a created automatic snapshot policy to the disk. Default value: false.

properties.name: resource_group_id
properties.description: (ForceNew, ForceNew, Available in 1.57.0+) The Id of resource group which the disk belongs. -> NOTE: Disk category cloud has been outdated and it only can be used none I/O Optimized ECS instances. Recommend cloud_efficiency and cloud_ssd disk.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: instance_id
properties.description: (Required, Forces new resource) ID of the Instance to attach to.

properties.name: disk_id
properties.description: (Required, Forces new resource) ID of the Disk to be attached.

properties.name: device_name
properties.description: (Deprecated) The device name has been deprecated, and when attaching disk, it will be allocated automatically by system according to default order from /dev/xvdb to /dev/xvdz.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: image_id
properties.description: (Required) The Image to use for the instance. ECS instance's image can be replaced via changing 'image_id'. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

properties.name: instance_type
properties.description: (Required) The type of instance to start.

properties.description: (Deprecated) It has been deprecated on instance resource. All the launched alicloud instances will be I/O optimized.

properties.name: is_outdated
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to use outdated instance type. Default to false.

properties.name: security_groups
properties.description: (Required) A list of security group ids to associate with.

properties.name: availability_zone
properties.description: (Optional) The Zone to start the instance in. It is ignored and will be computed when set vswitch_id.

properties.name: instance_name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the ECS. This instance_name can have a string of 2 to 128 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, such as "-",".","_", and must not begin or end with a hyphen, and must not begin with http:// or https://. If not specified, Terraform will autogenerate a default name is ECS-Instance.

properties.name: allocate_public_ip
properties.description: (Deprecated) It has been deprecated from version "1.7.0". Setting "internet_max_bandwidth_out" larger than 0 can allocate a public ip address for an instance.

properties.name: system_disk_category
properties.description: (Optional) Valid values are ephemeral_ssd, cloud_efficiency, cloud_ssd, cloud_essd, cloud. cloud only is used to some none I/O optimized instance. Default to cloud_efficiency.

properties.name: system_disk_size
properties.description: (Optional) Size of the system disk, measured in GiB. Value range: [20, 500]. The specified value must be equal to or greater than max{20, Imagesize}. Default value: max{40, ImageSize}. ECS instance's system disk can be reset when replacing system disk.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Description of the instance, This description can have a string of 2 to 256 characters, It cannot begin with http:// or https://. Default value is null.

properties.name: internet_charge_type
properties.description: (Optional) Internet charge type of the instance, Valid values are PayByBandwidth, PayByTraffic. Default is PayByTraffic. At present, 'PrePaid' instance cannot change the value to "PayByBandwidth" from "PayByTraffic".

properties.name: internet_max_bandwidth_in
properties.description: (Optional) Maximum incoming bandwidth from the public network, measured in Mbps (Mega bit per second). Value range: [1, 200]. If this value is not specified, then automatically sets it to 200 Mbps.

properties.name: internet_max_bandwidth_out
properties.description: (Optional) Maximum outgoing bandwidth to the public network, measured in Mbps (Mega bit per second). Value range: [0, 100]. Default to 0 Mbps.

properties.name: host_name
properties.description: (Optional) Host name of the ECS, which is a string of at least two characters. “hostname” cannot start or end with “.” or “-“. In addition, two or more consecutive “.” or “-“ symbols are not allowed. On Windows, the host name can contain a maximum of 15 characters, which can be a combination of uppercase/lowercase letters, numerals, and “-“. The host name cannot contain dots (“.”) or contain only numeric characters. On other OSs such as Linux, the host name can contain a maximum of 30 characters, which can be segments separated by dots (“.”), where each segment can contain uppercase/lowercase letters, numerals, or “_“. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

properties.name: password
properties.description: (Optional, Sensitive) Password to an instance is a string of 8 to 30 characters. It must contain uppercase/lowercase letters and numerals, but cannot contain special symbols. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

properties.name: kms_encrypted_password
properties.description: (Optional, Available in 1.57.1+) An KMS encrypts password used to an instance. If the password is filled in, this field will be ignored. When it is changed, the instance will reboot to make the change take effect.

properties.name: kms_encryption_context
properties.description: (Optional, MapString, Available in 1.57.1+) An KMS encryption context used to decrypt kms_encrypted_password before creating or updating an instance with kms_encrypted_password. See Encryption Context. It is valid when kms_encrypted_password is set.

properties.name: vswitch_id
properties.description: (Optional) The virtual switch ID to launch in VPC. This parameter must be set unless you can create classic network instances.

properties.name: instance_charge_type
properties.description: (Optional) Valid values are PrePaid, PostPaid, The default is PostPaid.

properties.name: resource_group_id

properties.name: timeouts
properties.description: » Timeouts
NOTE: Available in 1.46.0+.
The timeouts block allows you to specify timeouts for certain actions:

properties.name: create
properties.description: (Defaults to 10 mins) Used when creating the instance (until it reaches the initial Running status). Note: There are extra at most 2 minutes used to retry to aviod some needless API errors and it is not in the timeouts configure.

properties.name: update
properties.description: (Defaults to 10 mins) Used when stopping and starting the instance when necessary during update

properties.name: delete
properties.description: (Defaults to 20 mins) Used when terminating the instance. Note: There are extra at most 5 minutes used to retry to aviod some needless API errors and it is not in the timeouts configure.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: (Optional) A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
Combining security group rules, the policy can define multiple application scenario. Default to true. It is valid from verison 1.7.2.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: type
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The type of rule being created. Valid options are ingress (inbound) or egress (outbound).

properties.name: ip_protocol
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The protocol. Can be tcp, udp, icmp, gre or all.

properties.name: port_range
properties.description: (ForceNew) The range of port numbers relevant to the IP protocol. Default to "-1/-1". When the protocol is tcp or udp, each side port number range from 1 to 65535 and '-1/-1' will be invalid. For example, 1/200 means that the range of the port numbers is 1-200. Other protocols' 'port_range' can only be "-1/-1", and other values will be invalid.

properties.name: security_group_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The security group to apply this rule to.

properties.name: nic_type
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Network type, can be either internet or intranet, the default value is internet.

properties.name: policy
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Authorization policy, can be either accept or drop, the default value is accept.

properties.name: priority
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Authorization policy priority, with parameter values: 1-100, default value: 1.

properties.name: cidr_ip
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The target IP address range. The default value is 0.0.0.0/0 (which means no restriction will be applied). Other supported formats include 10.159.6.18/12. Only IPv4 is supported.

properties.name: source_security_group_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The target security group ID within the same region. If this field is specified, the nic_type can only select intranet.

properties.name: source_group_owner_account
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The Alibaba Cloud user account Id of the target security group when security groups are authorized across accounts. This parameter is invalid if cidr_ip has already been set.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The description of the security group rule. The description can be up to 1 to 512 characters in length. Defaults to null.
NOTE: Either the source_security_group_id or cidr_ip must be set.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: disk_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The source disk ID.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Name of the snapshot. This name can have a string of 2 to 128 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, such as "-", ".", "_", and must not begin or end with a hyphen, and must not begin with http:// or https://. Default value is null.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Description of the snapshot. This description can have a string of 2 to 256 characters, It cannot begin with http:// or https://. Default value is null.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: (Optional) A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

cloud_ssd

properties.description: An ultra disk, supports a maximum of 5120 GiB (5 TB). If the data to be stored is larger than 2048 GiB, an ultra disk can only support the following data sizes (GiB): [2560, 3072, 3584, 4096, 4608, 5120].

properties.description: (Required) The data node disk type. Supported values: cloud_ssd, cloud_efficiency.

properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of VSwitch.

properties.name: password
properties.description: (Optional, Sensitive) The password of the instance. The password can be 8 to 32 characters in length and must contain three of the following conditions: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters (!@#$%<sup>&*()_+-=).</sup>

properties.name: kms_encrypted_password
properties.description: (Optional, Available in 1.57.1+) An KMS encrypts password used to a instance. If the password is filled in, this field will be ignored, but you have to specify one of password and kms_encrypted_password fields.

properties.name: kms_encryption_context
properties.description: (Optional, MapString, Available in 1.57.1+) An KMS encryption context used to decrypt kms_encrypted_password before creating or updating instance with kms_encrypted_password. See Encryption Context. It is valid when kms_encrypted_password is set.

properties.description: (Optional) Set the instance's IP whitelist in VPC network.

properties.description: (Optional) Set the Kibana's IP whitelist in internet network.

properties.name: master_node_spec
properties.description: (Optional) The dedicated master node spec. If specified, dedicated master node will be created.

properties.name: zone_count
properties.description: (Optional, Available in 1.44.0+) The Multi-AZ supported for Elasticsearch, between 1 and 3. The data_node_amount value must be an integral multiple of the zone_count value.

properties.description: » Timeouts
NOTE: Available in 1.48.0+.
The timeouts block allows you to specify timeouts for certain actions:

properties.name: create
properties.description: (Defaults to 120 mins) Used when creating the elasticsearch instance (until it reaches the initial active status).

properties.name: update
properties.description: (Defaults to 120 mins) Used when activating the elasticsearch instance when necessary during update

properties.name: delete
properties.description: (Defaults to 120 mins) Used when terminating the elasticsearch instance. Note: There are 5 minutes to sleep to eusure the instance is deleted. It is not in the timeouts configure.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of emr cluster. The name length must be less than 64. Supported characters: chinese character, english character, number, "-", "_".

properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) EMR Version, e.g. EMR-3.22.0. You can find the all valid EMR Version in emr web console.

properties.name: cluster_type
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) EMR Cluster Type, e.g. HADOOP, KAFKA, DRUID, etc. You can find all valid EMR cluster type in emr web console.

properties.name: charge_type
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Charge Type for this cluster. Supported value: PostPaid or PrePaid. Default value: PostPaid.

properties.name: zone_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Zone ID, e.g. cn-huhehaote-a

properties.name: security_group_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Security Group ID for Cluster, you can also specify this key for each host group.

properties.name: vswitch_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Global vswitch id, you can also specify it in host group.

properties.name: option_software_list
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Optional software list.

properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) High Available for HDFS and YARN. If this is set true, MASTER group must have two nodes.

properties.name: use_local_metadb
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Use local metadb. Default is false.

properties.name: ssh_enable
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) If this is set true, we can ssh into cluster. Default value is false.

properties.name: master_pwd
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Master ssh password.

properties.name: eas_enable
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) High security cluster (true) or not. Default value is false.

properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Alicloud EMR uses roles to perform actions on your behalf when provisioning cluster resources, running applications, dynamically scaling resources. properties.name: related_cluster_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) This specify the related cluster id, if this cluster is a Gateway.

properties.name: host_group
properties.description: (Optional) Groups of Host, You can specify MASTER as a group, CORE as a group (just like the above example).

The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name for ess alarm.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The description for the alarm.

properties.name: enable
properties.description: (Optional, Available in 1.48.0+) Whether to enable specific ess alarm. Default to true.

properties.name: alarm_actions
properties.description: (Required) The list of actions to execute when this alarm transition into an ALARM state. Each action is specified as ess scaling rule ari.

properties.name: scaling_group_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The scaling group associated with this alarm, the 'ForceNew' attribute is available in 1.56.0+.

properties.name: metric_type
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The type for the alarm's associated metric. Supported value: system, custom. "system" means the metric data is collected by Aliyun Cloud Monitor Service(CMS), "custom" means the metric data is upload to CMS by users. Defaults to system.

properties.name: metric_name
properties.description: (Required) The name for the alarm's associated metric.

properties.name: period
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The period in seconds over which the specified statistic is applied. Supported value: 60, 120, 300, 900. Defaults to 300.

properties.name: statistics
properties.description: (Optional) The statistic to apply to the alarm's associated metric. Supported value: Average, Minimum, Maximum. Defaults to Average.

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: (Required) The value against which the specified statistics is compared.

properties.name: comparison_operator
properties.description: (Optional) The arithmetic operation to use when comparing the specified Statistic and Threshold. The specified Statistic value is used as the first operand. Supported value: >=, <=, >, <. Defaults to >=.

properties.name: evaluation_count
properties.description: (Optional) The number of times that needs to satisfies comparison condition before transition into ALARM state. Defaults to 3.

properties.name: cloud_monitor_group_id
properties.description: (Optional) Defines the application group id defined by CMS which is assigned when you upload custom metric to CMS, only available for custom metirc.

properties.name: dimensions
properties.description: (Optional) The dimension map for the alarm's associated metric (documented below). For all metrics, you can not set the dimension key as "scaling_group" or "userId", which is set by default, the second dimension for metric, such as "device" for "PackagesNetIn", need to be set by users.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: scaling_group_id
properties.description: (Required) ID of the scaling group of a scaling configuration.

properties.name: instance_ids
properties.description: (Required) ID of the ECS instance to be attached to the scaling group. You can input up to 20 IDs.

properties.name: force
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to remove forcibly "AutoCreated" ECS instances in order to release scaling group capacity "MaxSize" for attaching ECS instances. Default to false.
NOTE: "AutoCreated" ECS instance will be deleted after it is removed from scaling group, but "Attached" will be not.

properties.name: The attached ECS instances must in the running state.
properties.description: • The attached ECS instances must in the running state.

properties.name: The attached ECS instances has not been attached to other scaling groups.

The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: scaling_group_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the Auto Scaling group.

properties.name: notification_arn
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The Alibaba Cloud Resource Name (ARN) for the notification object. The format of notification_arn is acs:ess:{region}:{account-id}:{resource-relative-id}. Valid values for resource-relative-id: 'cloudmonitor', 'queue/', 'topic/'.

properties.name: notification_types
properties.description: (Optional) The notification types of Auto Scaling events and resource changes. Supported notification types: 'AUTOSCALING:SCALE_OUT_SUCCESS', 'AUTOSCALING:SCALE_IN_SUCCESS', 'AUTOSCALING:SCALE_OUT_ERROR', 'AUTOSCALING:SCALE_IN_ERROR', 'AUTOSCALING:SCALE_REJECT', 'AUTOSCALING:SCALE_OUT_START', 'AUTOSCALING:SCALE_IN_START', 'AUTOSCALING:SCHEDULE_TASK_EXPIRING'.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: scaling_group_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the Auto Scaling group to which you want to assign the lifecycle hook.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The name of the lifecycle hook, which is a string containing 2 to 40 English or Chinese characters. If this parameter value is not specified, the default value is lifecycle hook id.

properties.name: lifecycle_transition
properties.description: (Required) Type of Scaling activity attached to lifecycle hook. Supported value: SCALE_OUT, SCALE_IN.

properties.name: heartbeat_timeout
properties.description: (Optional) Defines the amount of time, in seconds, that can elapse before the lifecycle hook times out. When the lifecycle hook times out, Auto Scaling performs the action defined in the default_result parameter. Default value: 600.

properties.name: default_result
properties.description: (Optional) Defines the action the Auto Scaling group should take when the lifecycle hook timeout elapses. Applicable value: CONTINUE, ABANDON, default value: CONTINUE.

properties.name: notification_arn
properties.description: (Optional) The Arn of notification target.

properties.name: notification_metadata
properties.description: (Optional) Additional information that you want to include when Auto Scaling sends a message to the notification target.

If this parameter is set, the system disk size must be greater than or equal to max{40, ImageSize}.
