properties.name: instance_charge_type
properties.description: (Optional) Valid values are PrePaid, PostPaid, Default to PostPaid.

properties.name: period
properties.description: (Optional) The duration that you will buy DB instance (in month). It is valid when instance_charge_type is PrePaid. Valid values: [1~9], 12, 24, 36. Default to 1.

properties.name: auto_renew
properties.description: (Optional, Available in 1.36.0+) Whether to renewal a DB instance automatically or not. It is valid when instance_charge_type is PrePaid. Default to false.

properties.name: auto_renew_period
properties.description: (Optional, Available in 1.36.0+) Auto-renewal period of an instance, in the unit of the month. It is valid when instance_charge_type is PrePaid. Valid value:[1~12], Default to 1.

properties.name: instance_type
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The engine to use: Redis or Memcache. Defaults to Redis.

properties.name: vswitch_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The ID of VSwitch.

properties.name: engine_version
properties.description: - (Optional, ForceNew) Engine version. Supported values: 2.8, 4.0 and 5.0. Default value: 2.8. Only 2.8 can be supported for Memcache Instance.

properties.name: security_ips
properties.description: - (Optional) Set the instance's IP whitelist of the default security group.

properties.name: private_ip
properties.description: - (Optional) Set the instance's private IP.

properties.name: backup_id
properties.description: - (Optional) If an instance created based on a backup set generated by another instance is valid, this parameter indicates the ID of the generated backup set.

properties.name: vpc_auth_mode
properties.description: - (Optional) Only meaningful if instance_type is Redis and network type is VPC. Valid values are Close, Open. Defaults to Open. Close means the redis instance can be accessed without authentication. Open means authentication is required.

properties.name: parameters
properties.description: (Optional) Set of parameters needs to be set after instance was launched. Available parameters can refer to the latest docs Instance configurations table .

properties.name: tags
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.55.3+) A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

properties.name: maintain_start_time
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.56.0+) The start time of the operation and maintenance time period of the instance, in the format of HH:mmZ (UTC time).

properties.name: maintain_end_time
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.56.0+) The end time of the operation and maintenance time period of the instance, in the format of HH:mmZ (UTC time).
NOTE: The start time to the end time must be 1 hour. For example, the MaintainStartTime is 01:00Z, then the MaintainEndTime must be 02:00Z.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: project
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The project name to the machine group belongs.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The machine group name, which is unique in the same project.

properties.name: identify_type
properties.description: (Optional) The machine identification type, including IP and user-defined identity. Valid values are "ip" and "userdefined". Default to "ip".

properties.name: identify_list
properties.description: - (Required) The specific machine identification, which can be an IP address or user-defined identity.

properties.name: topic
properties.description: (Optional) The topic of a machine group.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The name of the log project. It is the only in one Alicloud account.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Description of the log project.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: project
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The project name to the log store belongs.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The log store, which is unique in the same project.

properties.name: retention_period
properties.description: (Optional) The data retention time (in days). Valid values: [1-3650]. Default to 30. Log store data will be stored permanently when the value is "3650".

properties.name: shard_count
properties.description: (Optional) The number of shards in this log store. Default to 2. You can modify it by "Split" or "Merge" operations. Refer to details

properties.name: auto_split
properties.description: (Optional) Determines whether to automatically split a shard. Default to true.

properties.name: max_split_shard_count
properties.description: (Optional) The maximum number of shards for automatic split, which is in the range of 1 to 64. You must specify this parameter when autoSplit is true.

properties.name: append_meta
properties.description: (Optional) Determines whether to append log meta automatically. The meta includes log receive time and client IP address. Default to true.

properties.name: enable_web_tracking
properties.description: (Optional) Determines whether to enable Web Tracking. Default false.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: logstore

properties.name: list description
properties.description: full_text - The configuration of full text index. Valid item as follows:

properties.name: case_sensitive

properties.name: include_chinese
properties.description: (Optional) Whether includes the chinese. Default to false.

properties.name: token
properties.description: (Optional) The string of several split words, like "\r", "#"

properties.name: list description
properties.description: field_search - List configurations of field search index. Valid item as follows:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The field name, which is unique in the same log store.

properties.name: type
properties.description: (Optional) The type of one field. Valid values: ["long", "text", "double", "json"]. Default to "long".

properties.name: alias
properties.description: (Optional) The alias of one field

properties.name: case_sensitive
properties.description: (Optional) Whether the case sensitive for the field. Default to false. It is valid when "type" is "text" or "json".

properties.name: include_chinese
properties.description: (Optional) Whether includes the chinese for the field. Default to false. It is valid when "type" is "text" or "json".

properties.name: token
properties.description: (Optional) The string of several split words, like "\r", "#". It is valid when "type" is "text" or "json".

properties.name: enable_analytics
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to enable field analytics. Default to true.
Note: At least one of the "full_text" and "field_search" should be specified.

The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, ForcesNew)Two queues on a single account in the same region cannot have the same name. A queue name must start with an English letter or a digit, and can contain English letters, digits, and hyphens, with the length not exceeding 256 characters .

properties.name: delay_seconds
properties.description: (Optional)This attribute defines the length of time, in seconds, after which every message sent to the queue is dequeued. Valid value range: 0-604800 seconds, i.e., 0 to 7 days. Default value to 0.

properties.name: maximum_message_size
properties.description: (Optional)This indicates the maximum length, in bytes, of any message body sent to the queue. Valid value range: 1024-65536, i.e., 1K to 64K. Default value to 65536.

properties.name: message_retention_period
properties.description: (Optional) Messages are deleted from the queue after a specified length of time, whether they have been activated or not. This attribute defines the viability period, in seconds, for every message in the queue. Valid value range: 60-604800 seconds, i.e., 1 minutes to 7 days. Default value to 345600.

properties.name: visibility_timeout
properties.description: (Optional) The VisibilityTimeout attribute of the queue. A dequeued messages will change from active (visible) status to inactive (invisible) status, and this attribute defines the length of time, in seconds, that messages remain invisible. Messages return to active status after the set period. Valid value range: 1-43200 seconds, i.e., 1 seconds to 12 hours. Default value to 30.

properties.name: polling_wait_seconds
properties.description: (Optional) Long polling is measured in seconds. When this attribute is set to 0, long polling is disabled. When it is not set to 0, long polling is enabled and message dequeue requests will be processed only when valid messages are received or when long polling times out. Valid value range: 0-30 seconds. Default value to 0.

properties.name: topic_name
properties.description: - (Required, ForceNew) The topic which The subscription belongs to was named with the name.A topic name must start with an English letter or a digit, and can contain English letters, digits, and hyphens, with the length not exceeding 256 characters.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Two topics subscription on a single account in the same topic cannot have the same name. A topic subscription name must start with an English letter or a digit, and can contain English letters, digits, and hyphens, with the length not exceeding 256 characters.

properties.name: notify_strategy
properties.description: (Optional) The NotifyStrategy attribute of Subscription. This attribute specifies the retry strategy when message sending fails. the attribute has two value EXPONENTIAL_DECAY_RETR or BACKOFF_RETRY. Default value to BACKOFF_RETRY .

properties.name: notify_content_format
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The NotifyContentFormat attribute of Subscription. This attribute specifies the content format of the messages pushed to users. the attribute has two value SIMPLIFIED or XML.Default value to SIMPLIFIED .

properties.description: endpoint - (Required, ForceNew) The endpoint has three format. Available values format:
• HTTP Format: http://xxx.com/xxx

properties.name: Queue Format: acs:mns:{REGION}:{AccountID}:queues/{QueueName}
properties.description: • Queue Format: acs:mns:{REGION}:{AccountID}:queues/{QueueName}

properties.name: Email Format: mail:directmail:{MailAddress}
properties.description: • Email Format: mail:directmail:{MailAddress}

properties.name: filter_tag
properties.description: • filter_tag - (Optional, ForceNew) The length should be shorter than 16.

properties.description: • 10-GB increments.

properties.description: (Optional) Number of replica set nodes. Valid values: [3,5,7]

properties.name: storage_engine
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Storage engine: WiredTiger or RocksDB. System Default value: WiredTiger.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of DB instance. It a string of 2 to 256 characters.

properties.name: instance_charge_type
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Valid values are PrePaid, PostPaid,System default to PostPaid.

properties.name: period
properties.description: (Optional) The duration that you will buy DB instance (in month). It is valid when instance_charge_type is PrePaid. Valid values: [1~9], 12, 24, 36. System default to 1.

properties.name: zone_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The Zone to launch the DB instance. it supports multiple zone. If it is a multi-zone and vswitch_id is specified, the vswitch must in one of them. The multiple zone ID can be retrieved by setting multi to "true" in the data source alicloud_zones.

properties.name: vswitch_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The virtual switch ID to launch DB instances in one VPC.

properties.name: account_password
properties.description: (Optional, Sensitive) Password of the root account. It is a string of 6 to 32 characters and is composed of letters, numbers, and underlines.

properties.name: kms_encrypted_password
properties.description: (Optional, Available in 1.57.1+) An KMS encrypts password used to a instance. If the account_password is filled in, this field will be ignored.

properties.name: kms_encryption_context
properties.description: (Optional, MapString, Available in 1.57.1+) An KMS encryption context used to decrypt kms_encrypted_password before creating or updating instance with kms_encrypted_password. See Encryption Context. It is valid when kms_encrypted_password is set.

properties.name: security_ip_list
properties.description: (Optional) List of IP addresses allowed to access all databases of an instance. The list contains up to 1,000 IP addresses, separated by commas. Supported formats include 0.0.0.0/0, 10.23.12.24 (IP), and 10.23.12.24/24 (Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) mode. /24 represents the length of the prefix in an IP address. The range of the prefix length is [1,32]).

properties.name: backup_period
properties.description: (Optional, Available in 1.42.0+) MongoDB Instance backup period. It is required when backup_time was existed. Valid values: [Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday]. Default to [Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday]

properties.name: backup_time
properties.description: (Optional, Available in 1.42.0+) MongoDB instance backup time. It is required when backup_period was existed. In the format of HH:mmZ- HH:mmZ. Time setting interval is one hour. Default to a random time, like "23:00Z-24:00Z".

properties.name: maintain_start_time
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.56.0+) The start time of the operation and maintenance time period of the instance, in the format of HH:mmZ (UTC time).

properties.name: maintain_end_time
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.56.0+) The end time of the operation and maintenance time period of the instance, in the format of HH:mmZ (UTC time).
NOTE: The start time to the end time must be 1 hour. For example, the MaintainStartTime is 01:00Z, then the MaintainEndTime must be 02:00Z.

properties.name: block-cors_rule

properties.name: allowed_headers
properties.description: (Optional) Specifies which headers are allowed.

properties.name: allowed_methods
properties.description: (Required) Specifies which methods are allowed. Can be GET, PUT, POST, DELETE or HEAD.

properties.name: allowed_origins
properties.description: (Required) Specifies which origins are allowed.

properties.name: expose_headers
properties.description: (Optional) Specifies expose header in the response.

properties.name: max_age_seconds
properties.description: (Optional) Specifies time in seconds that browser can cache the response for a preflight request.

properties.name: block-website
properties.description: » Block website
The website mapping supports the following:

properties.name: index_document
properties.description: (Required) Alicloud OSS returns this index document when requests are made to the root domain or any of the subfolders.

properties.name: error_document
properties.description: (Optional) An absolute path to the document to return in case of a 4XX error.

properties.name: block-logging
properties.description: » Block logging
The logging object supports the following:

properties.name: target_bucket
properties.description: (Required) The name of the bucket that will receive the log objects.

properties.name: target_prefix
properties.description: (Optional) To specify a key prefix for log objects.

properties.name: block-referer-configuration
properties.description: » Block referer configuration
The referer configuration supports the following:

properties.name: allow_empty

properties.name: referers
properties.description: (Required, Type: list) The list of referer.

properties.name: block-lifecycle_rule
properties.description: » Block lifecycle_rule
The lifecycle_rule object supports the following:

properties.name: id
properties.description: (Optional) Unique identifier for the rule. If omitted, OSS bucket will assign a unique name.

properties.name: prefix
properties.description: (Required) Object key prefix identifying one or more objects to which the rule applies.

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: (Required, Type: bool) Specifies lifecycle rule status.

properties.name: expiration
properties.description: (Optional, Required, Type: set) Specifies a period in the object's expire (documented below).

properties.name: block-expiration
properties.description: » Block expiration
The lifecycle_rule expiration object supports the following:

properties.name: date
properties.description: (Optional) Specifies the date after which you want the corresponding action to take effect. The value obeys ISO8601 format like 2017-03-09.

properties.name: days
properties.description: (Optional, Type: int) Specifies the number of days after object creation when the specific rule action takes effect.
NOTE: One and only one of "date" and "days" can be specified in one expiration configuration.

properties.name: block-server-side-encryption-rule
properties.description: » Block server-side encryption rule
The server-side encryption rule supports the following:

properties.name: sse_algorithm
properties.description: (Required) The server-side encryption algorithm to use. Possible values: AES256 and KMS.

properties.name: block-versioning
properties.description: » Block versioning
The versioning supports the following:

properties.name: status
properties.description: (Required) Specifies the versioning state of a bucket. Valid values: Enabled and Suspended.
NOTE: Currently, the versioning feature is only available in ap-south-1 and with white list. If you want to use it, please contact us.

properties.name: content_disposition
properties.description: (Optional) Specifies presentational information for the object. Read RFC2616 Content-Disposition for further details.

properties.description: (Optional) Specifies expire date for the the request/response. Read RFC2616 Expires for further details.

resource

properties.description: (Optional) Read weight distribution. Read weights increase at a step of 100 up to 10,000. Enter weights in the following format: {"Instanceid":"Weight","Instanceid":"Weight"}. This parameter must be set when distribution_type is set to Custom.

properties.name: engine_version
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Database version. Value options can refer to the latest docs CreateDBInstance EngineVersion.

properties.name: master_db_instance_id
properties.description: (Required) ID of the master instance.

properties.name: instance_type
properties.description: (Required) DB Instance type. For details, see Instance type table.

properties.name: instance_storage
properties.description: (Required) User-defined DB instance storage space. Value range: [5, 2000] for MySQL/SQL Server HA dual node edition. Increase progressively at a rate of 5 GB. For details, see Instance type table.

properties.name: instance_name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of DB instance. It a string of 2 to 256 characters.

properties.name: parameters
properties.description: (Optional) Set of parameters needs to be set after DB instance was launched. Available parameters can refer to the latest docs View database parameter templates.

properties.name: zone_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The Zone to launch the DB instance.

properties.name: vswitch_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The virtual switch ID to launch DB instances in one VPC.
NOTE: Because of data backup and migration, change DB instance type and storage would cost 15~20 minutes. Please make full preparation before changing them.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the SLB. This name must be unique within your AliCloud account, can have a maximum of 80 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, such as "-","/",".","_", and must not begin or end with a hyphen. If not specified, Terraform will autogenerate a name beginning with tf-lb.

properties.name: internet
properties.description: (Deprecated) Field 'internet' has been deprecated from provider version 1.55.3. Use 'address_type' replaces it.

properties.name: list description
internet: After an Internet SLB instance is created, the system allocates a public IP address so that the instance can forward requests from the Internet.
properties.description: • internet: After an Internet SLB instance is created, the system allocates a public IP address so that the instance can forward requests from the Internet.

properties.name: intranet: After an intranet SLB instance is created, the system allocates an intranet IP address so that the instance can only forward intranet requests.
properties.description: • intranet: After an intranet SLB instance is created, the system allocates an intranet IP address so that the instance can only forward intranet requests.

properties.name: internet_charge_type
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Valid values are PayByBandwidth, PayByTraffic. If this value is "PayByBandwidth", then argument "internet" must be "true". Default is "PayByTraffic". If load balancer launched in VPC, this value must be "PayByTraffic". Before version 1.10.1, the valid values are "paybybandwidth" and "paybytraffic".

properties.name: bandwidth
properties.description: (Optional) Valid value is between 1 and 1000, If argument "internet_charge_type" is "paybytraffic", then this value will be ignore.

properties.name: listener
properties.description: (Deprecated) The field has been deprecated from terraform-alicloud-provider version 1.3.0, and use resource alicloud_slb_listener to replace.

properties.name: vswitch_id
properties.description: (Required for a VPC SLB, Forces New Resource) The VSwitch ID to launch in. If address_type is internet, it will be ignore.

properties.name: specification
properties.description: (Optional) The specification of the Server Load Balancer instance. Default to empty string indicating it is "Shared-Performance" instance. Launching "Performance-guaranteed" instance, it is must be specified and it valid values are: "slb.s1.small", "slb.s2.small", "slb.s2.medium", "slb.s3.small", "slb.s3.medium", "slb.s3.large" and "slb.s4.large".

properties.name: tags
properties.description: (Optional) A mapping of tags to assign to the resource. The tags can have a maximum of 10 tag for every load balancer instance.

properties.name: instance_charge_type
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.34.0+) The billing method of the load balancer. Valid values are "PrePaid" and "PostPaid". Default to "PostPaid".

properties.name: period
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.34.0+) The duration that you will buy the resource, in month. It is valid when instance_charge_type is PrePaid. Default to 1. Valid values: [1-9, 12, 24, 36].

properties.name: master_zone_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew, Available in v1.36.0+) The primary zone ID of the SLB instance. If not specified, the system will be randomly assigned. You can query the primary and standby zones in a region by calling the DescribeZone API.

properties.name: slave_zone_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew, Available in v1.36.0+) The standby zone ID of the SLB instance. If not specified, the system will be randomly assigned. You can query the primary and standby zones in a region by calling the DescribeZone API.

properties.name: delete_protection
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.51.0+) Whether enable the deletion protection or not. on: Enable deletion protection. off: Disable deletion protection. Default to off. Only postpaid instance support this function.

properties.name: address_ip_version
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.55.2+) The IP version of the SLB instance to be created, which can be set to ipv4 or ipv6 . Default to "ipv4". Now, only internet instance support ipv6 address.

properties.name: address
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.55.2+) Specify the IP address of the private network for the SLB instance, which must be in the destination CIDR block of the correspond ing switch.

properties.name: resource_group_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew, Available in v1.55.3+) The Id of resource group which the SLB belongs. -> NOTE: A "Shared-Performance" instance can be changed to "Performance-guaranteed", but the change is irreversible.

NOTE: To change a "Shared-Performance" instance to a "Performance-guaranteed" instance, the SLB will have a short probability of business interruption (10 seconds-30 seconds). Advise to change it during the business downturn, or migrate business to other SLB Instances by using GSLB before changing.
NOTE: Currently, the alibaba cloud international account does not support creating a PrePaid SLB instance.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) Name of the access control list.

properties.name: ip_version
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The IP Version of access control list is the type of its entry (IP addresses or CIDR blocks). It values ipv4/ipv6. Our plugin provides a default ip_version: "ipv4".

properties.name: entry_list
properties.description: (Optional) A list of entry (IP addresses or CIDR blocks) to be added. At most 50 etnry can be supported in one resource. It contains two sub-fields as Entry Block follows.

properties.name: entry-block
properties.description: » Entry Block
The entry mapping supports the following:

properties.name: entry
properties.description: (Required) An IP addresses or CIDR blocks.

properties.name: comment
properties.description: (Optional) the comment of the entry.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: load_balancer_id
properties.description: (Required) ID of the load balancer.

properties.name: instance_ids
properties.description: (Required) A list of instance ids to added backend server in the SLB.

properties.name: weight
properties.description: (Optional) Weight of the instances. Valid value range: [0-100]. Default to 100.

properties.name: slb_id
properties.description: (Deprecated) It has been deprecated from provider version 1.6.0. New field 'load_balancer_id' replaces it.

properties.name: instances
properties.description: (Deprecated) It has been deprecated from provider version 1.6.0. New field 'instance_ids' replaces it.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) Name of the CA Certificate.

properties.name: ca_certificate
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) the content of the CA certificate.

properties.name: resource_group_id

The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: load_balancer_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The Load Balancer ID which is used to launch a new listener.

properties.name: frontend_port
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Port used by the Server Load Balancer instance frontend. Valid value range: [1-65535].

properties.name: backend_port
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Port used by the Server Load Balancer instance backend. Valid value range: [1-65535].

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The protocol to listen on. Valid values are [http, https, tcp, udp].

properties.name: bandwidth
properties.description: (Optional) Bandwidth peak of Listener. For the public network instance charged per traffic consumed, the Bandwidth on Listener can be set to -1, indicating the bandwidth peak is unlimited. Valid values are [-1, 1-1000] in Mbps.

properties.name: scheduler
properties.description: (Optional) Scheduling algorithm, Valid values are wrr, rr and wlc. Default to "wrr".

properties.name: sticky_session
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to enable session persistence, Valid values are on and off. Default to off.

properties.name: sticky_session_type
properties.description: (Optional) Mode for handling the cookie. If sticky_session is "on", it is mandatory. Otherwise, it will be ignored. Valid values are insert and server. insert means it is inserted from Server Load Balancer; server means the Server Load Balancer learns from the backend server.

properties.name: cookie_timeout
properties.description: (Optional) Cookie timeout. It is mandatory when sticky_session is "on" and sticky_session_type is "insert". Otherwise, it will be ignored. Valid value range: [1-86400] in seconds.

properties.name: cookie
properties.description: (Optional) The cookie configured on the server. It is mandatory when sticky_session is "on" and sticky_session_type is "server". Otherwise, it will be ignored. Valid value：String in line with RFC 2965, with length being 1- 200. It only contains characters such as ASCII codes, English letters and digits instead of the comma, semicolon or spacing, and it cannot start with $.

properties.name: persistence_timeout
properties.description: (Optional) Timeout of connection persistence. Valid value range: [0-3600] in seconds. Default to 0 and means closing it.

properties.name: health_check
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to enable health check. Valid values areon and off. TCP and UDP listener's HealthCheck is always on, so it will be ignore when launching TCP or UDP listener.

properties.name: health_check_type
properties.description: (Optional) Type of health check. Valid values are: tcp and http. Default to tcp . TCP supports TCP and HTTP health check mode, you can select the particular mode depending on your application.

properties.name: health_check_domain
properties.description: (Optional) Domain name used for health check. When it used to launch TCP listener, health_check_type must be "http". Its length is limited to 1-80 and only characters such as letters, digits, ‘-‘ and ‘.’ are allowed. When it is not set or empty, Server Load Balancer uses the private network IP address of each backend server as Domain used for health check.

properties.name: health_check_uri
properties.description: (Optional) URI used for health check. When it used to launch TCP listener, health_check_type must be "http". Its length is limited to 1-80 and it must start with /. Only characters such as letters, digits, ‘-’, ‘/’, ‘.’, ‘%’, ‘?’, #’ and ‘&’ are allowed.

properties.name: health_check_connect_port
properties.description: (Optional) Port used for health check. Valid value range: [1-65535]. Default to "None" means the backend server port is used.

properties.name: healthy_threshold
properties.description: (Optional) Threshold determining the result of the health check is success. It is required when health_check is on. Valid value range: [1-10] in seconds. Default to 3.

properties.name: unhealthy_threshold
properties.description: (Optional) Threshold determining the result of the health check is fail. It is required when health_check is on. Valid value range: [1-10] in seconds. Default to 3.

properties.name: health_check_timeout
properties.description: (Optional) Maximum timeout of each health check response. It is required when health_check is on. Valid value range: [1-300] in seconds. Default to 5. Note: If health_check_timeout < health_check_interval, its will be replaced by health_check_interval.

properties.name: health_check_interval
properties.description: (Optional) Time interval of health checks. It is required when health_check is on. Valid value range: [1-50] in seconds. Default to 2.

properties.name: health_check_http_code
properties.description: (Optional) Regular health check HTTP status code. Multiple codes are segmented by “,”. It is required when health_check is on. Default to http_2xx. Valid values are: http_2xx, http_3xx, http_4xx and http_5xx.

properties.name: ssl_certificate_id
properties.description: (Deprecated) It has been deprecated from 1.59.0 and using server_certificate_id instead.

properties.name: server_certificate_id
properties.description: (Optional, Available in 1.59.0+) SLB Server certificate ID. It is required when protocol is https.

properties.name: gzip
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to enable "Gzip Compression". If enabled, files of specific file types will be compressed, otherwise, no files will be compressed. Default to true. Available in v1.13.0+.

properties.name: x_forwarded_for
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to set additional HTTP Header field "X-Forwarded-For" (documented below). Available in v1.13.0+.

properties.name: acl_status
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to enable "acl(access control list)", the acl is specified by acl_id. Valid values are on and off. Default to off.

properties.name: acl_type
properties.description: (Optional) Mode for handling the acl specified by acl_id. If acl_status is "on", it is mandatory. Otherwise, it will be ignored. Valid values are white and black. white means the Listener can only be accessed by client ip belongs to the acl; black means the Listener can not be accessed by client ip belongs to the acl.

properties.name: acl_id
properties.description: (Optional) the id of access control list to be apply on the listener, is the id of resource alicloud_slb_acl. If acl_status is "on", it is mandatory. Otherwise, it will be ignored.

properties.name: established_timeout
properties.description: (Optional) Timeout of tcp listener established connection idle timeout. Valid value range: [10-900] in seconds. Default to 900.

properties.name: idle_timeout
properties.description: (Optional) Timeout of http or https listener established connection idle timeout. Valid value range: [1-60] in seconds. Default to 15.

properties.name: request_timeout
properties.description: (Optional) Timeout of http or https listener request (which does not get response from backend) timeout. Valid value range: [1-180] in seconds. Default to 60.

properties.name: enable_http2
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to enable https listener support http2 or not. Valid values are on and off. Default to on.

properties.name: tls_cipher_policy
properties.description: (Optional) Https listener TLS cipher policy. Valid values are tls_cipher_policy_1_0, tls_cipher_policy_1_1, tls_cipher_policy_1_2, tls_cipher_policy_1_2_strict. Default to tls_cipher_policy_1_0. Currently the tls_cipher_policy can not be updated when load balancer instance is "Shared-Performance".

properties.name: server_group_id
properties.description: (Optional) the id of server group to be apply on the listener, is the id of resource alicloud_slb_server_group.

properties.name: listener_forward
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew, Available in 1.40.0+) Whether to enable http redirect to https, Valid values are on and off. Default to off.

properties.name: forward_port
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew, Available in 1.40.0+) The port that http redirect to https.

NOTE: Once enable the http redirect to https function, any parameters excepted forward_port,listener_forward,load_balancer_id,frontend_port,protocol will be ignored. More info, please refer to Redirect http to https.
NOTE: Advantanced feature such as tls_cipher_policy, can not be updated when load balancer instance is "Shared-Performance". More info, please refer to Configure a HTTPS Listener.

properties.name: block-x_forwarded_for
properties.description: » Block x_forwarded_for
The x_forwarded_for mapping supports the following:

properties.name: retrive_slb_ip
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to use the XForwardedFor_SLBIP header to obtain the public IP address of the SLB instance. Default to false.

properties.name: retrive_slb_id
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to use the XForwardedFor header to obtain the ID of the SLB instance. Default to false.

properties.name: retrive_slb_proto
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to use the XForwardedFor_proto header to obtain the protocol used by the listener. Default to false.

properties.description: » Listener fields and protocol mapping

properties.name: scheduler

properties.name: sticky_session

properties.name: sticky_session_type

Valid values are insert and server. insert means it is inserted from Server Load Balancer; server means the Server Load Balancer learns from the backend server.

properties.name: cookie_timeout

properties.name: cookie

Otherwise, it will be ignored. Valid value：String in line with RFC 2965, with length being 1- 200. It only contains characters such as ASCII codes, English letters and digits instead of the comma, semicolon or spacing, and it cannot start with $.

properties.name: health_check
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.51.0+) Whether to enable health check. Valid values areon and off. TCP and UDP listener's HealthCheck is always on, so it will be ignore when launching TCP or UDP listener. This parameter is required and takes effect only when ListenerSync is set to off.

properties.name: health_check_domain
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.51.0+) Domain name used for health check. When it used to launch TCP listener, health_check_type must be "http". Its length is limited to 1-80 and only characters such as letters, digits, ‘-‘ and ‘.’ are allowed. When it is not set or empty, Server Load Balancer uses the private network IP address of each backend server as Domain used for health check.

properties.name: health_check_uri
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.51.0+) URI used for health check. When it used to launch TCP listener, health_check_type must be "http". Its length is limited to 1-80 and it must start with /. Only characters such as letters, digits, ‘-’, ‘/’, ‘.’, ‘%’, ‘?’, #’ and ‘&’ are allowed.

properties.name: health_check_connect_port
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.51.0+) Port used for health check. Valid value range: [1-65535]. Default to "None" means the backend server port is used.

properties.name: healthy_threshold
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.51.0+) Threshold determining the result of the health check is success. It is required when health_check is on. Valid value range: [1-10] in seconds. Default to 3.

properties.name: unhealthy_threshold
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.51.0+) Threshold determining the result of the health check is fail. It is required when health_check is on. Valid value range: [1-10] in seconds. Default to 3.

properties.name: health_check_timeout
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.51.0+) Maximum timeout of each health check response. It is required when health_check is on. Valid value range: [1-300] in seconds. Default to 5. Note: If health_check_timeout < health_check_interval, its will be replaced by health_check_interval.

properties.name: health_check_interval
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.51.0+) Time interval of health checks. It is required when health_check is on. Valid value range: [1-50] in seconds. Default to 2.

properties.name: health_check_http_code
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.51.0+) Regular health check HTTP status code. Multiple codes are segmented by “,”. It is required when health_check is on. Default to http_2xx. Valid values are: http_2xx, http_3xx, http_4xx and http_5xx.

properties.name: listener_sync

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The VPC ID.

properties.name: spec
properties.description: (Deprecated) It has been deprecated from provider version 1.7.1, and new field 'specification' can replace it.

properties.name: specification
properties.description: (Optional) The specification of the nat gateway. Valid values are Small, Middle and Large. Default to Small. Details refer to Nat Gateway Specification.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) Name of the nat gateway. The value can have a string of 2 to 128 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, such as "-",".","_", and must not begin or end with a hyphen, and must not begin with http:// or https://. Defaults to null.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Description of the nat gateway, This description can have a string of 2 to 256 characters, It cannot begin with http:// or https://. Defaults to null.

properties.name: bandwidth_packages
properties.description: (Optional) A list of bandwidth packages for the nat gatway. Only support nat gateway created before 00:00 on November 4, 2017. Available in v1.13.0+ and v1.7.1-.

properties.name: instance_charge_type
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew, Available in 1.45.0+) The billing method of the nat gateway. Valid values are "PrePaid" and "PostPaid". Default to "PostPaid".

properties.name: period
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew, Available in 1.45.0+) The duration that you will buy the resource, in month. It is valid when instance_charge_type is PrePaid. Default to 1. Valid values: [1-9, 12, 24, 36]. At present, the provider does not support modify "period" and you can do that via web console.

properties.name: block-bandwidth-packages
properties.description: » Block bandwidth packages
The bandwidth package mapping supports the following:

properties.name: ip_count
properties.description: (Required) The IP number of the current bandwidth package. Its value range from 1 to 50.

properties.name: bandwidth
properties.description: (Required) The bandwidth value of the current bandwidth package. Its value range from 5 to 5000.

properties.name: zone
properties.description: (Optional) The AZ for the current bandwidth. If this value is not specified, Terraform will set a random AZ.

properties.name: public_ip_addresses
properties.description: (Computer) The public ip for bandwidth package. the public ip count equal ip_count, multi ip would complex with ",", such as "10.0.0.1,10.0.0.2".
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The vpc_id of the network acl, the field can't be changed.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the network acl.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The description of the network acl instance.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: network_acl_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The id of the network acl, the field can't be changed.

properties.name: resources
properties.description: (Required) List of the resources associated with the network acl. The details see Block Resources.

properties.name: block-resources
properties.description: » Block Resources
The resources mapping supports the following:

properties.name: resource_id
properties.description: (Required) The resource id that the network acl will associate with.

properties.name: resource_type
properties.description: (Required) The resource id that the network acl will associate with. Only support VSwitch now.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: network_acl_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The id of the network acl, the field can't be changed.

properties.name: ingress
properties.description: (Optional) List of the ingress entries of the network acl. The order of the ingress entries determines the priority. The details see Block Ingress.

properties.name: egress
properties.description: (Optional) List of the egress entries of the network acl. The order of the egress entries determines the priority. The details see Block Egress.

properties.name: ingress-resources
properties.description: » Ingress Resources
The resources mapping supports the following:

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The description of the ingress entry.

properties.name: source_cidr_ip
properties.description: (Optional) The source ip of the ingress entry.

properties.name: entry_type
properties.description: (Optional) The entry type of the ingress entry. It must be custom or system. Default value is custom.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the ingress entry.

properties.name: policy
properties.description: (Optional) The policy of the ingress entry. It must be accept or drop.

properties.name: port
properties.description: (Optional) The port of the ingress entry.

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: (Optional) The protocol of the ingress entry.

properties.name: egress-resources
properties.description: » Egress Resources
The resources mapping supports the following:

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The description of the egress entry.

properties.name: destination_cidr_ip
properties.description: (Optional) The destination ip of the egress entry.

properties.name: entry_type
properties.description: (Optional) The entry type of the egress entry. It must be custom or system. Default value is custom.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the egress entry.

properties.name: policy
properties.description: (Optional) The policy of the egress entry. It must be accept or drop.

properties.name: port
properties.description: (Optional) The port of the egress entry.

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: (Optional) The protocol of the egress entry.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: router_id
properties.description: (Deprecated) This argument has beeb deprecated. Please use other arguments to launch a custom route entry.

properties.name: route_table_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the route table.

properties.name: destination_cidrblock
properties.description: (ForceNew) The RouteEntry's target network segment.

properties.name: list description
properties.description: nexthop_type - (ForceNew) The next hop type. Available values:

properties.name: Instance
properties.description: (Default): Route the traffic destined for the destination CIDR block to an ECS instance in the VPC.

properties.name: RouterInterface
properties.description: : Route the traffic destined for the destination CIDR block to a router interface.

properties.name: VpnGateway
properties.description: : Route the traffic destined for the destination CIDR block to a VPN Gateway.

properties.name: HaVip
properties.description: : Route the traffic destined for the destination CIDR block to an HAVIP.

properties.name: NetworkInterface
properties.description: : Route the traffic destined for the destination CIDR block to an NetworkInterface.

properties.name: NatGateway
properties.description: : Route the traffic destined for the destination CIDR block to an Nat Gateway.

properties.name: nexthop_id
properties.description: • nexthop_id - (ForceNew) The route entry's next hop. ECS instance ID or VPC router interface ID.

properties.name: name
properties.description: • name - (Optional, ForceNew, Available in 1.55.1+) The name of the route entry. This name can have a string of 2 to 128 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, such as "-",".","_", and must not begin or end with a hyphen, and must not begin with http:// or https://.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The vpc_id of the route table, the field can't be changed.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the route table.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The description of the route table instance.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.55.3+) A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: vswitch_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The vswitch_id of the route table attachment, the field can't be changed.

properties.name: route_table_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The route_table_id of the route table attachment, the field can't be changed.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: opposite_region
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The Region of peer side.

properties.name: router_type
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Router Type. Optional value: VRouter, VBR. Accepting side router interface type only be VRouter.

properties.name: opposite_router_type
properties.description: (Deprecated) It has been deprecated from version 1.11.0. resource alicloud_router_interface_connection's 'opposite_router_type' instead.

properties.name: router_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The Router ID.

properties.name: opposite_router_id
properties.description: (Deprecated) It has been deprecated from version 1.11.0. Use resource alicloud_router_interface_connection's 'opposite_router_id' instead.

properties.name: role
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The role the router interface plays. Optional value: InitiatingSide, AcceptingSide.

properties.name: specification
properties.description: (Optional) Specification of router interfaces. It is valid when role is InitiatingSide. Accepting side's role is default to set as 'Negative'. For more about the specification, refer to Router interface specification.

properties.name: access_point_id
properties.description: (Deprecated) It has been deprecated from version 1.11.0.

properties.name: opposite_access_point_id
properties.description: (Deprecated) It has been deprecated from version 1.11.0.

properties.name: opposite_interface_id
properties.description: (Deprecated) It has been deprecated from version 1.11.0. Use resource alicloud_router_interface_connection's 'opposite_router_id' instead.

properties.name: opposite_interface_owner_id
properties.description: (Deprecated) It has been deprecated from version 1.11.0. Use resource alicloud_router_interface_connection's 'opposite_interface_id' instead.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) Name of the router interface. Length must be 2-80 characters long. Only Chinese characters, English letters, numbers, period (.), underline (_), or dash (-) are permitted. If it is not specified, the default value is interface ID. The name cannot start with http:// and https://.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Description of the router interface. It can be 2-256 characters long or left blank. It cannot start with http:// and https://.

properties.name: health_check_source_ip
properties.description: (Optional) Used as the Packet Source IP of health check for disaster recovery or ECMP. It is only valid when router_type is VBR. The IP must be an unused IP in the local VPC. It and health_check_target_ip must be specified at the same time.

properties.name: health_check_target_ip
properties.description: (Optional) Used as the Packet Target IP of health check for disaster recovery or ECMP. It is only valid when router_type is VBR. The IP must be an unused IP in the local VPC. It and health_check_source_ip must be specified at the same time.

properties.name: instance_charge_type
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The billing method of the router interface. Valid values are "PrePaid" and "PostPaid". Default to "PostPaid". Router Interface doesn't support "PrePaid" when region and opposite_region are the same.

properties.name: period
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) The duration that you will buy the resource, in month. It is valid when instance_charge_type is PrePaid. Default to 1. Valid values: [1-9, 12, 24, 36]. At present, the provider does not support modify "period" and you can do that via web console.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: interface_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) One side router interface ID.

properties.name: opposite_interface_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) Another side router interface ID. It must belong the specified "opposite_interface_owner_id" account.

properties.name: opposite_interface_owner_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Another side router interface account ID. Log on to the Alibaba Cloud console, select User Info > Account Management to check the account ID. Default to Provider account_id.

properties.name: opposite_router_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Another side router ID. It must belong the specified "opposite_interface_owner_id" account. It is valid when field "opposite_interface_owner_id" is specified.

properties.name: opposite_router_type
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew) Another side router Type. Optional value: VRouter, VBR. It is valid when field "opposite_interface_owner_id" is specified.
NOTE: The value of "opposite_interface_owner_id" or "account_id" must be main account and not be sub account.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: snat_table_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The value can get from alicloud_nat_gateway Attributes "snat_table_ids".

properties.name: source_vswitch_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The vswitch ID.

properties.name: snat_ip
properties.description: (Required) The SNAT ip address, the ip must along bandwidth package public ip which alicloud_nat_gateway argument bandwidth_packages.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: cidr_block
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The CIDR block for the VPC.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the VPC. Defaults to null.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The VPC description. Defaults to null.

properties.name: resource_group_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew, Available in 1.40.0+) The Id of resource group which the VPC belongs.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.55.3+) A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: availability_zone
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The AZ for the switch.

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The VPC ID.

properties.name: cidr_block
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The CIDR block for the switch.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the switch. Defaults to null.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The switch description. Defaults to null.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: (Optional, Available in v1.55.3+) A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the client certificate.

properties.name: ssl_vpn_server_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the SSL-VPN server.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the SSL-VPN server.

properties.name: vpn_gateway_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the VPN gateway.

properties.name: client_ip_pool
properties.description: (Required) The CIDR block from which access addresses are allocated to the virtual network interface card of the client.

properties.name: local_subnet
properties.description: (Required) The CIDR block to be accessed by the client through the SSL-VPN connection.

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: (Optional) The protocol used by the SSL-VPN server. Valid value: UDP(default) |TCP

properties.name: cipher
properties.description: (Optional) The encryption algorithm used by the SSL-VPN server. Valid value: AES-128-CBC (default)| AES-192-CBC | AES-256-CBC | none

properties.name: port
properties.description: (Optional) The port used by the SSL-VPN server. The default value is 1194.The following ports cannot be used: [22, 2222, 22222, 9000, 9001, 9002, 7505, 80, 443, 53, 68, 123, 4510, 4560, 500, 4500].

properties.name: compress
properties.description: - (Optional) Specify whether to compress the communication. Valid value: true (default) | false
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the IPsec connection.

properties.name: vpn_gateway_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the VPN gateway.

properties.name: customer_gateway_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the customer gateway.

properties.name: local_subnet
properties.description: (Required, Type:Set) The CIDR block of the VPC to be connected with the local data center. This parameter is used for phase-two negotiation.

properties.name: remote_subnet
properties.description: (Required, Type:Set) The CIDR block of the local data center. This parameter is used for phase-two negotiation.

properties.name: effect_immediately
properties.description: (Optional) Whether to delete a successfully negotiated IPsec tunnel and initiate a negotiation again. Valid value:true,false.

properties.name: ike_config
properties.description: (Optional) The configurations of phase-one negotiation.

properties.name: ipsec_config
properties.description: (Optional) The configurations of phase-two negotiation.

properties.name: block-ike_config
properties.description: » Block ike_config
The ike_config mapping supports the following:

properties.name: psk
properties.description: (Optional) Used for authentication between the IPsec VPN gateway and the customer gateway.

properties.name: ike_version
properties.description: (Optional) The version of the IKE protocol. Valid value: ikev1 | ikev2. Default value: ikev1

properties.name: ike_mode
properties.description: (Optional) The negotiation mode of IKE V1. Valid value: main (main mode) | aggressive (aggressive mode). Default value: main

properties.name: ike_enc_alg
properties.description: (Optional) The encryption algorithm of phase-one negotiation. Valid value: aes | aes192 | aes256 | des | 3des. Default Valid value: aes

properties.name: ike_auth_alg
properties.description: (Optional) The authentication algorithm of phase-one negotiation. Valid value: md5 | sha1 | sha256 | sha384 | sha512 |. Default value: sha1

properties.name: ike_pfs
properties.description: (Optional) The Diffie-Hellman key exchange algorithm used by phase-one negotiation. Valid value: group1 | group2 | group5 | group14 | group24. Default value: group2

properties.name: ike_lifetime
properties.description: (Optional) The SA lifecycle as the result of phase-one negotiation. The valid value of n is [0, 86400], the unit is second and the default value is 86400.

properties.name: ike_local_id
properties.description: (Optional) The identification of the VPN gateway.

properties.name: ike_remote_id
properties.description: (Optional) The identification of the customer gateway.

properties.name: block-ipsec_config
properties.description: » Block ipsec_config
The ipsec_config mapping supports the following:

properties.name: ipsec_enc_alg
properties.description: (Optional) The encryption algorithm of phase-two negotiation. Valid value: aes | aes192 | aes256 | des | 3des. Default value: aes

properties.name: ipsec_auth_alg
properties.description: (Optional) The authentication algorithm of phase-two negotiation. Valid value: md5 | sha1 | sha256 | sha384 | sha512 |. Default value: sha1

properties.name: ipsec_pfs
properties.description: (Optional) The Diffie-Hellman key exchange algorithm used by phase-two negotiation. Valid value: group1 | group2 | group5 | group14 | group24| disabled. Default value: group2

properties.name: ipsec_lifetime
properties.description: (Optional) The SA lifecycle as the result of phase-two negotiation. The valid value is [0, 86400], the unit is second and the default value is 86400.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the VPN customer gateway. Defaults to null.

properties.name: ip_address
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The IP address of the customer gateway.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The description of the VPN customer gateway instance.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the VPN. Defaults to null.

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The VPN belongs the vpc_id, the field can't be changed.

properties.name: instance_charge_type
properties.description: (ForceNew) The charge type for instance. Valid value: PostPaid, PrePaid. Default to PostPaid.

properties.name: period
properties.description: (Optional) The filed is only required while the InstanceChargeType is prepaid.

properties.name: bandwidth
properties.description: (Required) The value should be 10, 100, 200, 500, 1000 if the user is postpaid, otherwise it can be 5, 10, 20, 50, 100, 200, 500, 1000. It can't be changed by terraform.

properties.name: enable_ipsec
properties.description: (Optional) Enable or Disable IPSec VPN. At least one type of VPN should be enabled.

properties.name: enable_ssl
properties.description: - (Optional) Enable or Disable SSL VPN. At least one type of VPN should be enabled.

properties.name: ssl_connections
properties.description: (Optional) The max connections of SSL VPN. Default to 5. This field is ignored when enable_ssl is false.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The description of the VPN instance.

properties.name: vswitch_id
properties.description: (Optional, ForceNew, Available in v1.56.0+) The VPN belongs the vswitch_id, the field can't be changed.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: vpn_gateway_id
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The id of the vpn gateway.

properties.name: next_hop
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The next hop of the destination route.

properties.name: publish_vpc
properties.description: (Required) Whether to issue the destination route to the VPC.

properties.name: route_dest
properties.description: (Required, ForceNew) The destination network segment of the destination route.

properties.name: weight
properties.description: (Required) The value should be 0 or 100.
